title: Promos
body: It's not fair in the promos. Im S5 right now. I lost many of my games because of my jungler or mid laner. My ADc is fine, but my jungler barely ganks bot and decides to camp his friend he duo q ed with at top. its never fair. there should be another report section that says that your team never provided support to your lane or something like that{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body: Man it sucks that you've been having a sort of bad streak with your team play, trust I've been there myself. Too many times have I lost a trade knowing with only one gank we'd make a comeback, but our jungler has his own plans. It's hard knowing you can't control the whole team yourself, but a little communication can go a long way in your next games.
